brief_summary.textblock:
The reference intervals for Sonoclot Analysis may be different between Chinese and American.
      So far, no reference interval has been established in Chinese for Sonoclot Analysis. This
      study is going to establish the first Chinese reference intervals for Sonoclot Analysis and
      test whether they are different from American reference intervals.

clinical_study.brief_title: Reference Intervals for Sonoclot Analysis in Chinese

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Aged 18 and older

          -  Han ethnic

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Renal dysfunction

          -  Liver disorders

          -  Known coagulation disorders

          -  Patients taking medications in the last month

study_pop.textblock: Chinese healthy adults aged 18 and older

clinical_study.official_title: Reference Ranges for Sonoclot Analysis in Chinese

primary_outcome.description: whether Chinese reference intervals are different from Caucasian reference intervals.
primary_outcome.measure: The reference intervals for sonoclot analysis in Chinese

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective
